title: Restrictions (macOS) (com.apple.applicationaccess)
description: Use this section to define restrictions settings

allowAutoUnlock.title: Allow Apple Watch to auto unlock device

allowContentCaching.title: Allow Content Caching
allowContentCaching.description: When false this disallows content caching. Defaults to true. Introduced in macOS 10.13 but moved to the content caching domain in 10.13.4.

allowApplePersonalizedAdvertising.description: If 'false', the system limits Apple personalized advertising. Available in iOS 14 and later, and macOS 12 and later.

allowPrinterSharingModification.title: Allow modifying Printer Sharing setting
allowPrinterSharingModification.description:
If 'false', prevents modifying Printer Sharing setting in System Settings.
Available in macOS 14 and later.

allowUniversalControl.title: Allow Universal Control
allowUniversalControl.description: Set to false to prevent sharing mouse and keyboard between a Mac and an iPad

allowAccountModification.description: If 'false', disables account modification. iOS requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 7 and later, and macOS 14.0 and later.

allowDiagnosticSubmission.title: Allow submitting diagnostic and usage data to Apple
allowDiagnosticSubmission.description: If false, prevents the device from automatically submitting diagnostic reports to Apple.

allowRemoteAppleEventsModification.title: Allow modifying Remote Apple Events Sharing setting
allowRemoteAppleEventsModification.description:
If 'false', prevents modifying Remote Apple Events Sharing setting in System Settings.
Available in macOS 14 and later.

allowCloudBTMM.title: Allow iCloud Back to My Mac

allowCloudPrivateRelay.title: Allow iCloud Private Relay
allowCloudPrivateRelay.description: If set to false, prevents the use of iCloud Private Relay.

allowEraseContentAndSettings.title: Allow Erase All Content and Settings

allowFingerprintForUnlock.title: Allow Touch ID / Face ID to unlock device

allowFingerprintModification.title: Allow Modifying Touch ID Fingerprints
allowFingerprintModification.description: If 'false', prevents the user from modifying Touch ID or Face ID. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 8.3 and later, and macOS 14 and later.

allowDeprecatedWebKitTLS.title: Allow accessing websites using TLS 1.0 and 1.1
allowDeprecatedWebKitTLS.description: Allow websites that use TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 to be accessed using Safari.

allowDeviceNameModification.title: Allow Modifying Device Name
allowDeviceNameModification.description:
If 'false', prevents the user from changing the device name. Requires a supervised device.
Available in iOS 9 and later, macOS 14 and later, and tvOS 11.0 and later.

allowMultiplayerGaming.title: Allow Multiplayer Gaming
allowMultiplayerGaming.description: If 'false', the system prohibits multiplayer gaming. Available in iOS 4.1 and later, and macOS 10.13 and later. Requires a supervised device in iOS.

allowInternetSharingModification.title: Allow modifying Internet Sharing setting
allowInternetSharingModification.description:
If 'false', prevents modifying Internet Sharing setting in System Settings.
Available in macOS 14 and later.

allowLocalUserCreation.title: Allow creating users in System Settings
allowLocalUserCreation.description:
If 'false', prevents creating new users in System Settings.
Available in macOS 14 and later.

ratingRegion.title: Region Code
ratingRegion.description: The two-letter key that profile tools use to display the proper ratings for the given region. The client doesn't recognize or report this data.

allowARDRemoteManagementModification.title: Allow modifying Remote Management Sharing setting
allowARDRemoteManagementModification.description:
If 'false', prevents modifying the Remote Management Sharing setting in System Settings.
Available in macOS 14 and later.

allowBluetoothSharingModification.title: Allow modifying Bluetooth Sharing setting
allowBluetoothSharingModification.description:
If 'false', prevents modifying the Remote Management Sharing setting in System Settings.
Available in macOS 14 and later.

allowAirPrintiBeaconDiscovery.title: Allow discovery of AirPrint printers using iBeacons

forceAirPrintTrustedTLSRequirement.title: Disallow AirPrint to destinations with untrusted certificates

allowStartupDiskModification.title: Allow modifying Startup Disk settings
allowStartupDiskModification.description:
If 'false', prevents modification of Startup Disk setting in System Settings.
Available in macOS 14 and later.

allowTimeMachineBackup.title: Allow modifying Time Machine settings
allowTimeMachineBackup.description:
If 'false', prevents modification of Time Machine settings in System Settings.
Available in macOS 14 and later.

allowUIConfigurationProfileInstallation.title: Allow user installation of configuration profiles

allowRemoteScreenObservation.title: Allow AirPlay and View Screen by Classroom app
allowRemoteScreenObservation.description: If 'Allow Screenshots and Screen Recording' is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference and prevents the Classroom app from observing remote screens.

forceClassroomUnpromptedScreenObservatio.title: Allow Classroom app to perform AirPlay and View Screen without prompting
forceClassroomUnpromptedScreenObservatio.description:
If Allow screenshots and screen recording is set to 'false' or Allow AirPlay and View Screen by Classroom app, they also override this preference and prevents the Classroom app from unprompted remote AirPlay and view screens.

Additionally, if set to true and ScreenObservationPermissionModificationAllowed is also true in the Education payload, a student enrolled in a managed course via the Classroom app will automatically give permission to that course's teacher's requests to observe the student's screen without prompting the student.

forceClassroomUnpromptedAppAndDeviceLock.title: Allow Classroom to lock apps or the device without prompting

forceClassroomAutomaticallyJoinClasses.title: Automatically join Classroom classes without prompting

forceClassroomRequestPermissionToLeaveCl.title: Require teacher permission to leave Classroom app unmanaged classes

allowPasswordProximityRequests.title: Allow proximity based password sharing requests

allowPasscodeModification.title: Allow Modifying Passcode
allowPasscodeModification.description: If 'false', the system prevents adding, changing, or removing the passcode. The system ignores this restriction on Shared iPad. Available in iOS 9 and later, and macOS 10.13 and later. Requires a supervised device in iOS.

allowWallpaperModification.title: Allow Modifying Wallpaper
allowWallpaperModification.description: If 'false', the system prevents changing the wallpaper. Available in iOS 9 and later, and macOS 10.13 and later. Requires a supervised device in iOS.

allowUSBRestrictedMode.title: Allow USB Restricted Mode
allowUSBRestrictedMode.description: Set to false to allow new USB accessories to connect to a Mac without authorization

allowAssistant.title: Allow Siri
allowAssistant.description: If 'false', disables Siri or Siri settings. Available in iOS 5 and later, and macOS 14.0 and later. Also available on iOS for user enrollment.

forceAssistantProfanityFilter.title: Enable Siri Profanity Filter
forceAssistantProfanityFilter.description: If 'true', the system forces the use of the profanity filter assistant. Available in iOS 11 and later, and macOS 10.13 and later. Requires a supervised device in iOS.

allowRapidSecurityResponseInstallation.title: Allow rapid security response installation
allowRapidSecurityResponseInstallation.description: Set to false to prevent the installation of rapid security responses

allowRapidSecurityResponseRemoval.title: Allow rapid security response removal
allowRapidSecurityResponseRemoval.description: Set to false to prevent the removal of rapid security responses

enforcedSoftwareUpdateMinorOSDeferredIns.title: Deferred Minor Software Updates Delay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateMinorOSDeferredIns.description: Number of days minor software updates will be hidden from the user.

forceDelayedAppSoftwareUpdates.title: Defer non-OS Software Updates
forceDelayedAppSoftwareUpdates.description: If true, delays user visibility of non-OS Software Updates. Requires a supervised device.

enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay.title: Deferred Software Updates Delay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay.description: Number of days the software updates will be hidden from the user.

enforcedSoftwareUpdateNonOSDeferredInsta.title: Deferred non-OS Software Updates Delay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateNonOSDeferredInsta.description: Number of days non-OS software updates will be hidden from the user.

enforcedSoftwareUpdateMajorOSDeferredIns.title: Deferred Major Software Updates Delay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateMajorOSDeferredIns.description: Number of days major software updates will be hidden from the user.

enforcedFingerprintTimeout.title: Enforced Fingerprint Timeout
enforcedFingerprintTimeout.description: Period of time in seconds after which the device will require entry of password or passcode to unlock.

allowDictation.title: Allow dictation
allowDictation.description: If 'false', the system disallows dictation input. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 10.3 and later, and macOS 10.13 and later.

forceOnDeviceOnlyDictation.title: Force On-Device Only Dictation
forceOnDeviceOnlyDictation.description: If 'true', the system disables connections to Siri servers for the purposes of dictation. Available in iOS 14.5 and later, macOS 14 and later, and watchOS 10 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

safariAllowAutoFill.title: Allow AutoFill in Safari
safariAllowAutoFill.description:
If 'false', the system disables Safari AutoFill for passwords, contact info, and credit cards and also prevents using the Keychain for AutoFill. As of iOS 13, requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 4 and later, and macOS 10.13 and later.
The system still allows third-party password managers, and apps can use AutoFill.

allowFindMyDevice.title: Allow Find My Devices
allowFindMyDevice.description: If 'false', the system disables Find My Device in the Find My app. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 13 and later, and macOS 10.15 and later.

allowFindMyFriends.title: Allow Find My Friends
allowFindMyFriends.description: If 'false', the system disables Find My Friends in the Find My app. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 13 and later, and macOS 10.15 and later.
